text:
@SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer This ridiculous accusation comes after you sat on Trump’s $2.5B coronavirus funding request for TWO WEEKS and turned it into an $8.3B boondoggle. You are complete scum. 

You are such a hypocrite and a fraud, Nancy. All you do is project. Everybody sees it.
